channel.title: Silab Items: Editing item stats
channel.description:
Please help.
I see item.cfg and it only has items up to 7000ish...
i need up to 20000 list that i can edit...
How do i do this
also i got a server angelscape and i wanna edit my stats to be 99999999999999/135 how can i make this possible

item.title: Silab Items: Editing item stats
item.dc:creator: @DELOCH DELOCH
item.description:
@DELOCH wrote:

works like a charm

thanks.

anyway how do i make 9999999999999999999999999999/135 stat :\

and how do i change weapon speed…

Read full topic

item.title: Silab Items: Editing item stats
item.dc:creator: @yoshimtu yoshimtu
item.description:
@yoshimtu wrote:

when you open item.cfg…
make a new line
for instance of a line of magic cape

item = 10719	Magic_Cape	It's_a_Magic_Cape.	0	0	0		0	0	1	100	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	999

but search silab client and fine all the item id’s
pretty much like regular items, just gotta get the id’s

Read full topic
